    How to Pick the Best Crypto Horse Betting Site

    Finding the best crypto horse betting site is not an easy task – especially when considering the wide range of options in the market.Â 

    Nevertheless, players can narrow down their options by taking into account the following factors.

    SecurityÂ 

    Players should make sure that their chosen crypto horse betting site has strong security measures in place. All of the casino sites from our list have adequate licensing to offer online gambling services.Â 

    In addition to this, players can also check for other features, such as an SSL certificate and the latest security protocols that ensure data is kept safe. Â 

    Horse Racing Betting Odds

    It is important to compare odds from multiple online sportsbooks and bookmakers in order to find the most competitive prices.Â 

    All of the best crypto horse racing betting sites we reviewed above stand out in the market with their often industry-leading odds.Â 

    Moreover, players should also check whether their chosen racebook offers odds in their preferred format.Â 

    For instance, some platforms might give odds in American or fractional format, while others might provide them in decimal.Â 

    There are also online betting sites that support multiple odds formats, such as decimal, fractional, and money-line.Â 

    Range of Horse Race Betting Markets

    In simple terms, the more betting markets a site offers, the more wagering options a player has to choose from.Â 

    As is clear from our guide, the best crypto horse race betting sites grant players access to a wide range of races from across the world.Â 

    Moreover, players should check out what types of race betting markets are available on different sites.Â 

    The top providers offer a wide range of horse race betting markets – such as win, place, show, exacta, quinella, trifecta, superfecta, and more.Â 

    Racebook BonusesÂ 

    Bonuses can significantly increase a player’s bankroll, allowing gamblers to play for longer periods or bet more than they would have otherwise.Â 

    The bonuses can vary widely between different crypto horse race betting sites.Â 

    Therefore, players need to think about what types of bonuses they prefer – such as matched deposits or free bets.Â 

    It is also important to check the wagering conditions before joining a platform for the purpose of claiming a bonus.Â 

    Live Streaming

    Based on our research, there are not many betting sites that feature live streaming of horse races.Â 

    Cloudbet is one of the few crypto horse race betting sites that feature this option. Moreover, there are also only a limited number of crypto casinos that facilitate in-play betting on races.Â 

    Mobile App

    Among the crypto horse racing betting sites we listed earlier, only 1xBit has a dedicated app.Â 

    Otherwise, players can access their chosen horse betting site from their standard phone browser.Â 

    Nevertheless, we noticed that all the top providers offer responsive websites that feature a smooth user experience, enabling players to bet on horse racing while on the go. Â 

    Accepted Cryptos

    Players should also consider whether the chosen horse race betting site accepts their preferred cryptocurrencies.Â 

    While the majority of providers support Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin payments, funding with digital assets such as Cardano, Solana, and Dogecoin is not widely available.Â 

    Min Deposit & Payout Time

    When checking out the payment options, also assess the deposit requirements.Â 

    For instance, on Lucky Block, players can get started with just $1, whereas the majority of other platforms stipulate $20 or more.Â 

    Moreover, the minimum deposit conditions might also be different for specific bonuses.Â 

    Payout times can also vary between betting sites – so it is best for players to choose a Bitcoin casino that supports instant withdrawals.Â 

    How to Bet on Horse Races with Crypto

    Wondering how to get started with a horse racing crypto betting site?Â 

    Below, we offer a step-by-step explanation of how to create an account and start betting with BetOnline – one of the best crypto horse racing betting sites of 2023.Â 

    Step 1: Join BetOnline

    The first port of call is to create an account with BetOnline. This requires players to provide some basic personal information – such as a full name, email address, and date of birth.Â 

    Then click on the ‘Create Account’ button to proceed.Â 

    Step 2: Complete KYC Verification

    BetOnline accepts both fiat and crypto deposits. And as such, this platform needs players to complete the KYC process.Â 

    Players can do this by providing a copy of their government-issued ID, such as a passport or driverâs license.Â 

    The platform will also need a recently issued proof of address document, like a utility bill.Â 

    Step 3: Deposit Funds

    Once the KYC verification is complete, players can fund their accounts. To do this, go to the ‘Cashier’ section of the account dashboard, and find the ‘Deposit’ button.Â 

    Next, choose the preferred cryptocurrency from the available deposit options.Â 

    Enter the desired deposit amount and carry out the transaction using an external crypto wallet.Â 

    At this stage, players can also enter a promo code to take advantage of the many BetOnline bonuses currently being offered. Â 

    Step 4: Select a Race and Place a Horse Racing BetÂ Â 

    Once the funds are credited to the account, players can head over to the ‘Racebook’ section and find an event they want to bet on.Â 

    Next, choose a race to bet on. BetOnline will now display the different betting markets along with the respective odds.Â 

    Choose the preferred option and enter a stake. The betting slip will reflect the chosen bet. Click on the ‘Submit All Bets’ button to place the wager.Â 

    Conclusion

    For those looking to bet on horse racing with crypto, Lucky Block, BC.Game and CloudBet all represent excellent choices – they offer access to tracks from multiple countries, as well as superb welcome bonuses.Â 

    Mega Dice is our overall best crypto casino, offering unmatched bonuses, leading slots games and both live and virtual casino games. It also has no KYC verification and instant payouts, allowing players to sign up and get playing quickly. It doesn’t offer horse racing yet, but could add it soon.

    Visit Mega Dice

    FAQs

    Is it possible to bet on horse racing with crypto?

    Yes, there are a growing number of online sportsbooks and betting sites that accept various cryptocurrencies as a form of payment, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and others. Some of our top picks include Mega Dice, Lucky Block, BC.Game, Cloudbet, and Jackbit.Â 

    Which is the best crypto horse racing betting site?

    Our research suggests that Mega Dice is the top overall crypto casino in the market, although it does not yet offer horse racing betting. Other top sites that do include Lucky Block, BC.Game and CloudBet.

    Whether it’s T20s, ODIs, or test games – the best Bitcoin cricket betting sites offer in-play wagers. This means that even if the game has already started, the site will offer live odds.Â 

    The odds will change on a second-by-second basis – based on each bowl. For example, if team A gets a wicket, then the odds of team B winning will increase. Â Â

    We only consider Bitcoin cricket betting sites that offer competitive odds. This can be a challenging metric to evaluate on a DIY basis, considering how many markets are on offer.Â

    How Does Bitcoin Cricket Betting Work?

    When betting on cricket with Bitcoin, the process works much the same as a traditional sportsbook. Only instead of depositing funds with a debit/credit card or bank account wire, payments are made on a crypto-to-crypto basis.Â 

    Furthermore, when cricket crypto betting online, the best platforms do not ask for any personal information when opening an account. This means that when betting on cricket with Bitcoin, the process is often anonymous.Â 

    • Players will have access to both domestic and international cricket games at leading providers like Lucky Block, across hundreds of individual betting markets.Â 
    • Players will also need to set up a betting slip to execute the wager.Â 
    • This simply requires the player to enter their stake and confirm the respective bet.

    Finally, the best crypto cricket betting sites usually settle bets as soon as the game has finished. This means that if the cricket bet won, the player can either use the funds to place another wager or withdraw the crypto to a private wallet.Â

    How to Find a Provably Fair Crypto Casino

    Provably fair games ensure each gaming outcome is transparent and credible. As such, these games are becoming increasingly popular and many players are looking for the best provably fair Bitcoin casino to join.

    Next, we’re going to talk about some of the key considerations to bear in mind when choosing a provably fair Bitcoin casino to play at.

    Selection of Provably Fair Games

    Players looking for the best provably fair Bitcoin casinos can start by checking game availability and variety. For instance, Lucky Block is one of the best Aviator gambling sites. Aviator is one of the most well-known provably fair games.

    When playing provably fair games like Aviator at Lucky Block, players can check the fairness of each round as they go. Prior to each round starting, the hashed version of the server seed can be found in the provably fair settings.

    The accuracy of each hash can be verified using any online calculator, or hash generator. This guide found that BC.Game is also one of the best provably fair bitcoin gambling sites for choice. The platform offers a huge of titles.

    We found provably fair titles to include Hi-Lo, Ring of Fortune, Egyptian, Classic Dice Cave Of Plunder, Wheel, Tower Legend, Sword, CoinFlip, Beauties, and many others. Cloudbet also offers plenty of provably fair arcade-style titles like mini roulette, dice games, and various versions of Mines, among others.

    Payout Time

    Provably fair Bitcoin casinos vary in terms of the speed at which they pay out winnings.

    For instance:

    • Lucky Block and BC.Game are processed instantlyÂ 
    • In contrast, Vave can take up to three days

    This is something to bear in mind when researching the most reliable Bitcoin casinos.

    Game Providers

    The top provably fair Bitcoin casinos offer titles from the most advanced and respected game providers. This guarantees that players can enjoy top-notch graphics and all immersive gameplay at their favorite gambling sites.

    For instance, the overall best provably fair Bitcoin casino, Lucky Block, is powered by some of the most recognizable software providers in the industry. This includes Pragmatic Play, Microgaming, Hacksaw, Quickspin, Betsoft, Kalamba, Play’n Go, Blueprint, Red Tiger, and over 80 others.

    BC.Game is another provably fair Bitcoin casino worth mentioning in this regard. The platform is able to offer games from the likes of NetEnt, EvoPlay, Spinomenal, Thunderkick, Elk Studios, and a long list of others.

    Games from top software developers are available on Cloudbet as well. We found this to include titles from Microgaming, 1×2 Gaming, ELK Studios, Just for The Win, Tom Horn Gaming, Playson, Triple Edge Studios, Wazdan, and many more.

    Secure Deposits

    The best provably fair Bitcoin casino sites will be able to facilitate secure deposits. For instance, at Lucky Block, players only need an email address and password to sign up and begin playing provably fair crypto games.

    The lack of KYC requirements at Lucky Block will appeal to cryptocurrency gamers worried about anonymity and privacy.

    Conclusion

    This guide has reviewed the best provably fair Bitcoin casinos in the space. We ranked Mega Dice, Lucky Block, and BC.Game as the top three provably fair gambling sites to consider.Â 

    All offer a wide range of games to play in a safe environment, in addition to welcome bonuses and a sportsbook.

    Mega Dice requires a super low minimum deposit of $1 and accepts both crypto and fiat payments to play provably fair games. New players can claim a 200% initial deposit bonus and a 10% referral fee, with rewards paid in USDT.Â 
    Â 

    Visit Mega Dice Now

    FAQs

    What is provably fair gambling?

    A provably fair Bitcoin casino offers games that can be verified for fairness and randomness. The player can check each roll’s outcome and ensure that they are not the victim of fraud. This can be done using provably fair verifiers at the casino or via a third party.

    Are slots provably fair?

    The best provably fair Bitcoin gambling sites offer a range of slot titles. However, not all are provably fair. Most provably fair slots have an RTP of between 97% and 99%. A seed number is generated, hashed, and sent to the player by the provably fair online casino so they can verify the results.

    What is the best provably fair Bitcoin casino?

    The best provably fair Bitcoin casino is Mega Dice. The casino offers provably fair games, in addition to thousands of other titles, and a 200% initial deposit bonus. The minimum deposit is just $1 and the casino supports a long list of cryptocurrencies and fiat payment types.

    How We Select the Best Dogecoin Casinos

    When ranking the best Dogecoin casinos, we focused on the following metrics:

    Private and Anonymous Accounts

    Most Dogecoin online casinos support private and anonymous betting accounts.Â 

    This means:

    • No personal information
    • No contact details (other than an email address)
    • No KYC documents

    Anonymous accounts are not available when gambling with fiat money, which is why Dogecoin casinos are becoming so popular.Â 

    Near-Instant Payments

    We also found that the best Dogecoin casinos offer rapid deposits and withdrawals. At Lucky Block, it takes just 2-3 minutes for DOGE deposits to clear.Â 

    Moreover, Lucky Block approves DOGE withdrawals near-instantly. As a result, it takes just minutes for winnings to be transferred to the selected Dogecoin wallet.Â

    Most of the platforms discussed on this page offer fee-free payments.Â

    We prefer Dogecoin casinos that offer a huge gambling suite across many gaming products. At a minimum, we expect to find dozens of table games like blackjack and roulette, across many different variations.Â 

    We also look for new Dogecoin casinos that offer a wide selection of slots and live dealer tables. The best Dogecoin casino sites – including Lucky Block, Cloudbet, and BC.Game – also offer an in-house sportsbook with competitive odds.Â 

    Dogecoin Bonuses and PromotionsÂ 

    When signing up with a Dogecoin casino site for the first time, players will usually receive a bonus.Â 

    This ranges from matched deposit bonuses, free spins, cashback, and risk-free bets. When researching Dogecoin casino bonuses, we take a very close look at the terms and conditions.Â 

    For instance, the minimum deposit to qualify for the bonus and what the wagering requirements amount to.

    Mobile Compatibility Â 

    All of the Dogecoin casinos discussed today enable players to place wagers on a smartphone device. Each platform has optimized its gaming suite for standard mobile web browsers.Â 

    Some of the Dogecoin casinos listed on this page offer a dedicated app, with both Android and iOS usually supported. Â 

    Reputation Â 

    Dogecoin casinos operate in an unregulated environment, so it is important to do some due diligence on a platform before opening an account.Â 

    With that said, the very best Dogecoin casino that we reviewed today – Lucky Block, is licensed with regulators in Curacao.Â 

    This shows that Lucky Block takes player safety seriously and that account holders can be confident in the legitimacy of its platform.Â 

    Customer Support Â 

    The best Dogecoin gambling sites in the market offer 24/7 customer support. With that said, we prefer platforms that offer support via live chat.Â 

    This prevents the need to send an email and subsequently wait several hours for a response.Â 

    Are Dogecoin Casinos Legal?

    Crypto assets – including Dogecoin, are unregulated in most countries. This means that Dogecoin gambling sites operate in a completely different way from fiat casinos. Â 

    For example, Dogecoin casinos like Lucky Block and Cloudbet do not have e a conventional KYC policy in place, so players can open an account anonymously.Â 

    Furthermore, unlike traditional casinos, many Dogecoin gambling sites operate without betting and withdrawal limits.Â 

    While players will need to research the legality of gambling in their own country, crypto casinos are generally not prohibited.Â

    Guide to Super Bowl Bitcoin Betting

    Sports betting has become an increasingly popular segment of online gambling in recent years. Thanks to a US Supreme Court decision that opened the door to state-by-state legalization, Americans now have access to online sports betting sites that allow them to gamble on Super Bowl using cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin.Â 

    Moreover, with online crypto gambling sites, Super Bowl betting is now accessible to not only Americans but also to sports enthusiasts from across the world. The best decentralized gambling sites allow players to fund their accounts with Bitcoin, as well as other popular cryptocurrencies.Â 

    This means that players need not pay high deposit fees, nor do they have to wait for days to get their winnings transferred to their wallets. Instead, the entire process is simplified, allowing players to get started with Super Bowl betting in a matter of minutes.Â 

    Bitcoin Super Bowl Betting Odds & Lines

    In crypto sports betting, odds and lines are used to specify the probability of an outcome, and how much money a player can win. To learn how to read odds, players need to understand what type of system they are dealing with.Â 

    The best Bitcoin Super Bowl sites feature different types of odds. However, players will most commonly find American and European odds when gambling on sports events such as the Super Bowl.Â 

    American Odds

    American odds, also known as the ‘Money line,’ is most popular in the US. In this case, the favorites will have odds represented with a minus (-) sign, which indicates the amount players need to stake to win $100. On the contrary, odds for underdogs will have a positive (+) sign.Â 

    For example, let’s say a betting website prices an NFL game between the Buffalo Bills and Cincinnati Bengals as follows:

    • Buffalo Bills: +125
    • Cincinnati Bengals: -150Â 

    This means that the bookmaker suggests that Cincinnati Bengals have a high probability of winning. So, if a player bets $150, they have a chance of winning $100, in order to get a total payout of $250.Â 

    On the other hand, if the player decides to bet on Buffalo Bills, they need to risk $100 in order to make a potential win of $125 – which will bring the total payout to $225.Â 

    In both cases, the winner will get back the initial stake, along with the amount won. The difference between the two odds also indicates how much of a chance the favorite has of winning the game.Â 

    European Odds

    European, also known as decimal odds, are widely used by players across Europe, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand. As it uses a decimal system, it’s easier to understand for many.Â 

    For instance, European odds for an NFL match can look something like this:

    • Buffalo Bills: 2.25
    • Cincinnati Bengals: 1.66

    To calculate the potential win, players can simply multiply the stake amount by the odds. So, if a player bets $100 on Buffalo Bills and the team wins, the winnings amount to $225 (2.25 X $100). The total payout is therefore $325 ($100 stake + $225 winnings).Â 

    With European odds, the higher the payout (higher the decimal point) – the less probability that the team will win.Â 

    In addition to American and European lines, many popular sites also support Super Bowl Bitcoin betting odds that are based on British (fractional), Hong Kong, Indonesian, and Malaysian systems.Â 

    Super Bowl Betting MarketsÂ 

    When looking for the best Bitcoin Super Bowl betting site, players should also consider what types of markets are available.Â 

    Below, we go over some of the most popular Super Bowl betting markets commonly found on crypto sports gambling sites.Â 

    1×2

    1×2 bets allow players to place wagers on the three possible results of a match. In this betting option,Â 

    ‘1’ represents a win for the home team, and ‘x’ suggests that the match will end in a draw.Â 

    As imaginable, the ‘2’ means that the away team will win. If a player correctly guesses the result, they will win the bet.Â 

    Point SpreadÂ 

    In sports betting, a point spread is the margin of victory in a match. It represents the difference between the oddsmaker’s and the betting market’s best guess.Â 

    As such, the spread can be as low as half a point, or even more than 50 – depending on the teams. In some betting markets, the point spread is also known as ‘handicap.’Â 

    Props

    A prop bet is not tied to the outcome or the final score of the game. Instead, it often revolves around individual players or other aspects of the game.Â 

    Some examples include:

    • Will there be a safety in the Super Bowl – yes or no?
    • Which team will have more rushing yards?
    • How many total receptions will a specific player have?

    The number of props markets available will vary from one sportsbook to another.Â 

    Game Totals

    Betting sites also allow players to speculate on the total score for the two teams playing the Super Bowl. Put simply, the player will need to wager whether the total score will be above or below a predefined number.Â 

    ParlayÂ 

    Parley is another way for football fans to bet on the Super Bowl. In simple terms, a parlay bet combines multiple wagers.Â 

    Although there is only one Super Bowl game, players can combine bets such as game lines, props, and others into one bet slip for a parlay.Â 

    All of the picks on the bet slip must be correct in order for it to be settled as a winner.Â 

    Super Bowl Futures BetÂ 

    In this bet, players need to consider the Super Bowl odds days, weeks, or months in advance to decide which team will win.Â 

    The catch is that the odds can change at any time, depending on events. For instance, players could get injured, or the coach might get sacked.Â 

    The team with the lowest Super Bowl odds is favored to win the championship, whereas the rest are deemed underdogs.Â 

    Super Bowl Bitcoin Free Bets & Bonuses 2023

    To encourage gambling on the Super Bowl, crypto betting sites often feature a variety of bonuses and promos.Â 

    In this section, let us take a look at the top crypto bonuses available on sportsbooks.Â 

    Cashback Bonuses

    With a cashback bonus, players can get a certain percentage of any losses encountered – usually for a specific number of days.Â 

    Cashback bonuses are not commonly available at all sports betting sites.Â 

    Lucky Block happens to be one of the few that offers this feature. With Lucky Block, players can get 15% cashback on any losses incurred after seven days of joining.Â 

    Matched DepositsÂ 

    Matched bonuses are offered by casinos when a player deposits funds into their account.Â 

    With this bonus, the sportsbook will offer a certain percentage of the deposit as a reward to the player.Â 

    This bonus amount can vary depending on the platform. On BC.Game, players can get a matched bonus of 1,260% across the first four deposits.Â 

    Matched deposits are commonly offered as a welcome package. However, some platforms also offer reload bonuses each time a returning player makes a deposit to the platform.Â 

    Risk-Free BetsÂ 

    A risk-free bet is an offer where the player will be refunded the original stake if the wager ends up losing. Usually, the amount is capped at a certain amount.Â 

    For instance, Winz.io offers sports gamblers a risk-free bet as part of the welcome bonus. However, this is capped at $20.Â 

    No Deposit Free BetsÂ 

    Free bets are another bonus commonly offered by sports gambling sites. With free bets, players can place wagers on the Super Bowl and other sports events without risking their own money.Â 

    No deposit free bets are offered as rewards for players when signing up with a site. This means that there is no need to make a deposit at the time of signing up.Â 

    Instead, players will receive free bet credits; however, they will need to fulfill huge wagering conditions before they can withdraw any winnings.Â 

    GiveawayÂ 

    Players will also come across gambling sites offering a Bitcoin giveaway for Super Bowl betting. Sometimes, the giveaway might be offered in the form of altcoins, instead of Bitcoin. To take part in the giveaway, players might have to buy entry tickets or fulfill other requirements.Â 

    Lucky Block has just completed a giveaway of $10k worth of LBLOCK tokens. All players who placed a wager on Lucky Block were eligible for the giveaway.Â 

    Below, we have included the bonuses offered by the leading platforms.Â 

    Live Super Bowl Betting with Crypto

    With the best Bitcoin Super Bowl betting sites, players can not only place wagers in advance, but during the course of the game.Â 

    All the Super Bowl betting sites on our list support in-play betting. This means that players can place bets while the game is live, while taking into account how the match is progressing.Â 

    Moreover,, new betting markets will also open up during the game, such as player props, next touchdown scorer, and more.Â 

    How to Bet on Super Bowl with Bitcoin

    FAQs

    How do I bet on the Super Bowl with Bitcoin?

    How much Bitcoin did Drake bet on the Super Bowl?

    In 2022, Canadian rapper Drake bet $1.25 million in Bitcoin on the Super Bowl game. This move even turned out to be one of the best Bitcoin Super Bowl commercial of all time. Drake bet on the Los Angeles Rams to beat the Cincinnati Bengals in the Super Bowl, and two other wagers. He won all three bets, with each of the payouts exceeding $700,000.Â

    How we Picked the Best Crypto NFL Betting Sites

    Here’s some additional information on how we ranked the 10+ best crypto NFL betting site providers for 2023.Â 

    Bitcoin NFL Betting Bonuses

    Players can claim a wide range of crypto betting bonuses when selecting an NFL sportsbook. Â Â 

    Examples of the best NFL bonuses currently on offer are highlighted below:

    • Lucky Block: 15% cashback on net losses after seven days of betting
    • BC.Game: Four deposit bonuses of between 270% and 360% – up to 1 BTC
    • Cloudbet: 100% matched deposit bonus of up to 5 BTC
    • Winz.io: Â $20 Risk-Free Bet and 100% Matched Deposit Bonus – up to $500

    As per the above, there are many different types of Bitcoin NFL betting bonuses that can be claimed by new players.Â 

    With that said, we also like sportsbooks that offer regular bonuses to players that already have an account.Â 

    Range of NFL Betting Markets

    We also spent countless hours researching which markets each crypto sportsbook offers on upcoming NFL games.Â 

    At one end of the spectrum, platforms like Lucky Block and FortuneJack offer hundreds of betting options on each NFL game. This includes a long list of bespoke handicaps and totals.Â 

    Platforms like BetOnline, however, offer just three betting markets on each NFL game – the money line, spread, and totals (over/under).Â 

    This is a super-limited number of markets to have access to, meaning that players are often forced to miss out on a more personalized bet.Â 

    Live NFL Betting

    There is nothing more frustrating than missing the start of an NFL game and thus – being unable to place a bet on the respective match.Â 

    Fortunately, the best crypto NFL betting sites offer in-play betting. In other words, even though the game has already started, players can still place bets.Â 

    There are usually fewer live betting markets available when compared to pre-match odds. But, nonetheless, bets will be available until the very end of the game. Â 

    As such, if the initial bet loses, players can still enter wagers to enjoy the remainder of the match. Â 

    Competitive NFL Betting Odds

    The best crypto NFL betting odds that we reviewed on this page – include the likes of Lucky Block, BC.Game, and Cloudbet – will often offer industry-leading odds.Â 

    This simply means that the respective platform is offering the best odds possible that cannot be rivaled by another sportsbook.Â 

    Choosing NFL betting sites that offer competitive odds will benefit the player in the long run. This is because the sportsbook will have a lesser advantage over the player.Â 

    Secure Crypto Payments

    All of the NFL sportsbooks discussed on this page accept payments in Bitcoin and a range of other digital currencies.Â 

    Players will first need to copy the wallet address given by the chosen NFL sportsbook, for the respective cryptocurrency. Then, paste the address into a private wallet and transfer the cryptocurrency tokens.Â 

    This provides a secure framework for making payments, as no financial data is entered into the sportsbook website.Â 

    Low Minimums & Fast Payouts

    Lucky Block is a prime example of a top-rated Bitcoin NFL betting site that caters to both casual players and high rollers.Â 

    For example, players can open an account and deposit from just $1 to get started. On the other hand, Lucky Block does not have any withdrawal limits in place.Â 

    We did, however, also come across NFL sportsbooks that impose low betting limits. This means that the sportsbook will determine the maximum bet size that the player can make.Â 

    How Does Bitcoin NFL Betting Work?

    Players that have traditionally used fiat-based NFL betting sites will find that crypto platforms are similar in many ways.Â 

    That is to say, players will need to open an account, make a deposit, and choose an NFL betting market. And as such, the overarching objective is to place bets and hopefully make some money.Â 

    • However, there are also many metrics that differentiate Bitcoin NFL betting sites from their fiat counterparts.
    • Â At the forefront of this is the KYC process.Â 
    • While fiat sportsbooks ask for personal information, contact details, and documentation before a withdrawal can be made, this is rarely the case when using one of the best Bitcoin NFL betting sites discussed today.Â 

    For example, Lucky Block only requires an email address and username to get started. Another benefit of using a crypto-centric NFL sportsbook is that withdrawals are usually processed in minutes, rather than several days.Â 

    Furthermore, the best crypto NFL betting sites offer generous promotions and welcome packages for both existing and new players.Â

    FAQs

    Can I use Bitcoin to bet on NFL?

    A wide range of online sportsbooks now accepts Bitcoin, so players can easily bet on the NFL with crypto from the comfort of home. Players can open an anonymous betting account with Mega Dice before depositing Bitcoin, Dogecoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and a range of other altcoins. Mega Dice offers attractive odds on NFL games throughout the week.Â 

    Can you deposit to DraftKings with Bitcoin?

    No, although there are growing rumors that DraftKings will eventually accept Bitcoin, this isn’t the case at the time of writing. Those looking to bet on the NFL with Bitcoin can instead use Mega Dice – a trusted crypto sportsbook with industry-leading odds and near-instant payouts.Â 

    Does William Hill accept Bitcoin?

    William Hill is one of the most established online sportsbooks but unfortunately, it does not accept Bitcoin or any cryptocurrency for that matter. The best alternative in this regard is Mega Dice, which accepts Bitcoin and a wide range of altcoins. The minimum deposit is just $1 at Mega Dice.Â 

    What is the best Bitcoin NFL betting site?

    Our research findings concluded that Mega Dice is the overall best Bitcoin NFL sportsbook to play at today. An account can be opened in just 30 seconds and the minimum deposit is modest at $1. No withdrawal limits apply and payouts often take just minutes. Mega Dice supports each and every NFL game and is often the best sportsbook for odds.Â
